title: Design and Utilization of ICT-Based Science Education Websites

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Scientific Principles and Digital Device Usage Experience
context.additional_context: For in-service secondary teachers, conducted in BYOD environments with emphasis on collaborative learning based on constructivist theory

learning_goals: Learners can explain web content design principles based on constructivist theory.
Learners can create a science education website using ICT tools (multimodal resources, interactive features).
Learners can demonstrate the process of optimizing website content by analyzing formative assessment data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
